00014 KumonosuManager::KumonosuManager(std::string serverAddress,
00015                                  int32_t serverPort)
00016 {
00017     _client = new Client(0, serverAddress, serverPort);
00018     _processor = new MessageProcessor<KumonosuManager>
00019         (this, &KumonosuManager::methodNotFound);
00020 
00021     _processor->setClient(_client);
00022     registerProcessorMethods();
00023 
00024     pthread_mutex_init(&_runMutex, NULL);
00025     pthread_mutex_init(&_processorLock, NULL);
00026     pthread_mutex_init(&_serverListLock, NULL);
00027 }

00029 KumonosuManager::KumonosuManager()
00030 {
00031     // The manager is service id 0
00032     _client = new Client(0);
00033     _processor = new MessageProcessor<KumonosuManager>
00034         (this, &KumonosuManager::methodNotFound);
00035 
00036     _processor->setClient(_client);
00037     registerProcessorMethods();
00038 
00039     pthread_mutex_init(&_runMutex, NULL);
00040     pthread_mutex_init(&_processorLock, NULL);
00041     pthread_mutex_init(&_serverListLock, NULL);
00042 }

00044 void
00045 KumonosuManager::run()
00046 {
00047     // Don't start running if already running
00048     int runfailed = -1;
00049     struct timespec check_timeout;
00050 
00051     clock_gettime(CLOCK_REALTIME, &check_timeout);
00052     runfailed = pthread_mutex_timedlock(&_runMutex, &check_timeout);
00053 
00054     if (runfailed) {
00055         return;
00056     }
00057 
00058     while (!_stop) {
00059         pthread_mutex_lock(&_processorLock);
00060 
00061         _processor->processPendingItems(-1);
00062 
00063         pthread_mutex_unlock(&_processorLock);
00064         sleep(1);
00065     }
00066 
00067     // Unlock the stop
00068     _stop = false;
00069     pthread_mutex_unlock(&_runMutex);
00070 }
00071 
00072 void
00073 KumonosuManager::stop()
00074 {
00075     _stop = true;
00076 }
00077 
00078 bool
00079 KumonosuManager::addServer(Server newServer)
00080 {
00081     bool result = true;
00082 
00083     for (int it = 0; it < _serverList.size(); it++) {
00084         if (_serverList[it] == newServer) {
00085             result = false;
00086         }
00087     }
00088 
00089     if (result) {
00090         _serverList.push_back(newServer);
00091     }
00092 
00093     return result;
00094 }

00099 void
00100 KumonosuManager::registerProcessorMethods()
00101 {
00102     _processor->setMethodCallback(ManagerMethodMap::IMGetServerList,
00103                                   &KumonosuManager::getServerList);
00104     _processor->setMethodCallback(ManagerMethodMap::IMGetServerResponse,
00105                                   &KumonosuManager::getServerListResponse);
00106     _processor->setMethodCallback(ManagerMethodMap::Ping,
00107                                   &KumonosuManager::ping);
00108     _processor->setMethodCallback(ManagerMethodMap::Pong,
00109                                   &KumonosuManager::pong);
00110     _processor->setMethodCallback(ManagerMethodMap::GetServiceList,
00111                                   &KumonosuManager::getServiceList);
00112     _processor->setMethodCallback
00113         (ManagerMethodMap::GetServiceListResponse,
00114          &KumonosuManager::getServiceListResponse);
00115 }

00117 void
00118 KumonosuManager::addService(int32_t serviceId)
00119 {
00120     // Don't allow duplicates
00121     bool add_id = true;
00122 
00123     for (int i = 0; i < _localServices.size(); i++) {
00124         if (_localServices[i] == serviceId) {
00125             add_id = false;
00126             break;
00127         }
00128     }
00129 
00130     if (add_id) {
00131         _localServices.push_back(serviceId);
00132     }
00133 }
00134 
00135 void
00136 KumonosuManager::removeService(int32_t serviceId)
00137 {
00138     for (int i = 0; i < _localServices.size(); i++) {
00139         if (_localServices[i] == serviceId) {
00140             _localServices.erase(_localServices.begin() + i);
00141             break;
00142         }
00143     }
00144 }

00155 void
00156 KumonosuManager::ping(arguments argList)
00157 {
00158     PingArguments pingItem;
00159     pingItem.loadFromArguments(argList);
00160     pingItem.loadServerId(_serverList);
00161 
00162     int32_t serverId = pingItem.getServerId();
00163     int32_t serviceId = pingItem.getServiceId();
00164     i32Arg pingId;
00165     pingId.name = "pingId";
00166     pingId.value = pingItem.getPingId();
00167 
00168     // Build the response
00169     queueItem item;
00170     item.methodId = ManagerMethodMap::Pong;
00171     item.serverId = serverId;
00172     item.argList.i32Args.push_back(pingId);
00173     _client->sendRequest(serviceId, item);
00174 
00175 }

00184 void
00185 KumonosuManager::getServerList(arguments argList)
00186 {
00187     int32_t destServerId = -1;
00188     int32_t destServiceId = -1;
00189     for (int i = 0; i < argList.i32Args.size(); i++) {
00190         if (argList.i32Args[i].name == "serverid") {
00191             destServerId = argList.i32Args[i].value;
00192         }
00193         if (argList.i32Args[i].name == "serviceid") {
00194             destServiceId = argList.i32Args[i].value;
00195         }
00196     }
00197 
00198     queueItem item;
00199     item.methodId = ManagerMethodMap::IMGetServerResponse;
00200     item.serverId = destServerId;
00201 
00202     i32Arg count;
00203     count.name = "serverCount";
00204     count.value = _serverList.size();
00205     item.argList.i32Args.push_back(count);
00206 
00207     ServerListArguments serverItem(_serverList);
00208     serverItem.addToArguments(&item.argList);
00209 
00210     _client->sendRequest(destServiceId, item);
00211 }
00212 
00213 void
00214 KumonosuManager::getServerListResponse(arguments argList)
00215 {
00216     std::vector<Server> newServerList;
00217 
00218     ServerListArguments serverArgs;
00219     serverArgs.loadFromArguments(argList);
00220     newServerList = serverArgs.getServerList();
00221 
00222     // Protect via multiple accesses
00223     pthread_mutex_lock(&_serverListLock);
00224 
00225     // Now that we have the list of servers, merge it with the known
00226     // list, not allowing for duplicates
00227     for (int i = 0; i < _serverList.size(); i++) {
00228         for (int j = 0; j < newServerList.size(); j++) {
00229             if (newServerList[j] == _serverList[i]) {
00230                 newServerList.erase(newServerList.begin() + j);
00231             }
00232         }
00233     }
00234 
00235     for (int j = 0; j < newServerList.size(); j++) {
00236         _serverList.push_back(newServerList[j]);
00237     }
00238 
00239     pthread_mutex_unlock(&_serverListLock);
00240 }
00241 
00242 void
00243 KumonosuManager::getServiceList(arguments argList)
00244 {
00245     // Get a list of all local services and send a
00246     // getServiceListResponse to the calling server
00247 
00248     int32_t destServerId = -1;
00249     int32_t destServiceId = -1;
00250     for (int i = 0; i < argList.i32Args.size(); i++) {
00251         if (argList.i32Args[i].name == "serverid") {
00252             destServerId = argList.i32Args[i].value;
00253         }
00254         if (argList.i32Args[i].name == "serviceid") {
00255             destServiceId = argList.i32Args[i].value;
00256         }
00257     }
00258 
00259     queueItem item;
00260     item.methodId = ManagerMethodMap::GetServiceListResponse;
00261     item.serverId = destServerId;
00262 
00263     i32Arg count;
00264     count.name = "serviceCount";
00265     count.value = _localServices.size();
00266     item.argList.i32Args.push_back(count);
00267 
00268     ServiceListArguments serviceItem(_localServices);
00269     serviceItem.addToArguments(&item.argList);
00270 
00271     _client->sendRequest(destServiceId, item);
00272 }
